title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 14, subpt. 14-11 - Miniature Boilers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 14, subpt. 14-11 - Miniature Boilers

State Regulations

Construction and Equipment (ยง 14-11.1 to 14-11.220)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 14, subpt. 14-11
[FN4] Reference herein to specifications SA (Ferrous) or
SB (Nonferrous) shall be understood to mean SA or SB specifications as
published by ASME with the latest
addenda. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
